UNHCR ggplot2 theme for histogramm with big labels for powerpoints

Source: R/unhcr_style_histo_big.R
unhcr_style_histo_big.Rd

Return ggplot2 styling for histogram with big labels for powerpoints

unhcr_style_histo_big()

Value

Return UNHCR Style

Author

Edouard Legoupil - with inspiration from bbc

Examples

unhcr_style_histo_big()

#> List of 20
#>  $ axis.title        : list()
#>   ..- attr(*, "class")= chr [1:2] "element_blank" "element"
